text: Francesco "Franco" Macri (15 April 1930 - 2 March 2019) was an Italian- Argentine businessman. He was the father of Argentine president Mauricio Macri. He was born in Rome, Italy. He co-founded a nationalist party, L'Uomo Qualunque (The Common Man). Macri, along with his son, were involved in the Panama Papers scandal. He worked in real estate in Buenos Aires and New York City.
